definition: a fastener consisting of a peg or pin or crosspiece that is inserted into an eye at the end of a rope or a chain or a cable in order to fasten it to something (as another rope or chain or cable), release by a toggle switch
details:
noun
- a fastener consisting of a peg or pin or crosspiece that is inserted into an eye at the end of a rope or a chain or a cable in order to fasten it to something (as another rope or chain or cable)
- a hinged switch that can assume either of two positions
= synonyms: toggle switch, on-off switch, on/off switch
- any instruction that works first one way and then the other
verb
- release by a toggle switch
= example: release by a toggle switch
- fasten with, or as if with, a toggle
- provide with a toggle or toggles
